name: Counting Sheep (toadletgames)
description:
Counting Sheep is a short little mini game made in a little under a week for a Game Programming Design Principles course (this week's focus being the observer pattern.) Controls:
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left Click to Bark (scare away coyotes)
  • P to Pause
Credits:
  • Design, Programming, and Art - toadletgames
  • Font - Kiwi Soda by jeti
